verses.text: \w Give|strong="H3034"\w* glory \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w mercy|strong="H3068"\w* endureth \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.

Let \w them|strong="H8085"\w* say \w so|strong="H8085"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w been|strong="H3605"\w* redeemed \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w whom|strong="H4310"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* hath redeemed \w from|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* hand \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* enemy: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* gathered \w out|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* countries.

\w From|strong="H8104"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* rising \w and|strong="H4941"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* setting \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* sun, \w from|strong="H8104"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* north \w and|strong="H4941"\w* \w from|strong="H8104"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* sea.

\w They|strong="H3068"\w* wandered \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* wilderness, \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* place without water: \w they|strong="H3068"\w* found \w not|strong="H2142"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* way \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* city \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* habitation.
\w They|strong="H7200"\w* \w were|strong="H1471"\w* hungry \w and|strong="H7200"\w* thirsty: \w their|strong="H7200"\w* soul fainted \w in|strong="H8055"\w* \w them|strong="H7200"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0001"\w* they cried \w to|strong="H0001"\w* \w the|strong="H5973"\w* Lord \w in|strong="H0001"\w* \w their|strong="H2398"\w* tribulation: \w and|strong="H0001"\w* \w he|strong="H0001"\w* delivered \w them|strong="H0001"\w* out \w of|strong="H0001"\w* \w their|strong="H2398"\w* distresses.

\w And|strong="H4714"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* led \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* right \w way|strong="H5921"\w*: \w that|strong="H3808"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* might go \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* city \w of|strong="H0001"\w* habitation.

Let \w the|strong="H0853"\w* mercies \w of|strong="H8034"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Lord give glory \w to|strong="H4616"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w*: \w and|strong="H3045"\w* \w his|strong="H3045"\w* wonderful works \w to|strong="H4616"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* children \w of|strong="H8034"\w* men.
For he hath satisfied \w the|strong="H1605"\w* empty soul, \w and|strong="H3220"\w* hath filled \w the|strong="H1605"\w* hungry soul \w with|strong="H3220"\w* good things.

Such \w as|strong="H3027"\w* sat \w in|strong="H3027"\w* darkness \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w in|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* shadow \w of|strong="H3027"\w* death: bound \w in|strong="H3027"\w* want \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w in|strong="H3027"\w* iron.

Because \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w had|strong="H3498"\w* exasperated \w the|strong="H3680"\w* words \w of|strong="H4325"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w*: \w and|strong="H4325"\w* provoked \w the|strong="H3680"\w* counsel \w of|strong="H4325"\w* \w the|strong="H3680"\w* most High:

\w And|strong="H1697"\w* \w their|strong="H0539"\w* heart \w was|strong="H1697"\w* humbled \w with|strong="H1697"\w* labours: they \w were|strong="H1697"\w* weakened, \w and|strong="H1697"\w* \w their|strong="H0539"\w* \w was|strong="H1697"\w* none \w to|strong="H1697"\w* help \w them|strong="H1697"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H3808"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* cried \w to|strong="H4116"\w* \w the|strong="H7911"\w* Lord \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w their|strong="H3808"\w* affliction: \w and|strong="H4116"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* delivered them out \w of|strong="H4639"\w* \w their|strong="H3808"\w* distresses.

\w And|strong="H0183"\w* \w he|strong="H8378"\w* brought them out \w of|strong="H0410"\w* darkness, \w and|strong="H0183"\w* \w the|strong="H5254"\w* shadow \w of|strong="H0410"\w* death; \w and|strong="H0183"\w* broke \w their|strong="H0410"\w* bonds \w in|strong="H0410"\w* sunder.

\w Let|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* mercies \w of|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* Lord \w give|strong="H5414"\w* glory \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w*, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* wonderful works \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* children \w of|strong="H5315"\w* men.
Because \w he|strong="H3068"\w* hath broken gates \w of|strong="H3068"\w* brass, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* burst \w the|strong="H3068"\w* iron bars.

\w He|strong="H5921"\w* took \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w way|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* iniquity: \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w were|strong="H0776"\w* \w brought|strong="H1104"\w* \w low|strong="H0776"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* injustices.

\w Their|strong="H7563"\w* soul abhorred all manner \w of|strong="H5712"\w* meat: \w and|strong="H0784"\w* they drew nigh even \w to|strong="H7563"\w* \w the|strong="H3857"\w* gates \w of|strong="H5712"\w* death.

\w And|strong="H7812"\w* \w they|strong="H6213"\w* cried \w to|strong="H7812"\w* \w the|strong="H7812"\w* Lord \w in|strong="H7812"\w* \w their|strong="H7812"\w* affliction: \w and|strong="H7812"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* delivered \w them|strong="H6213"\w* \w out|strong="H6213"\w* \w of|strong="H5695"\w* \w their|strong="H7812"\w* distresses.

\w He|strong="H0853"\w* sent \w his|strong="H0398"\w* word, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* healed \w them|strong="H0853"\w*: \w and|strong="H0398"\w* delivered \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w from|strong="H0398"\w* \w their|strong="H0398"\w* destructions.

Let \w the|strong="H7911"\w* mercies \w of|strong="H0410"\w* \w the|strong="H7911"\w* Lord give glory \w to|strong="H4714"\w* \w him|strong="H6213"\w*: \w and|strong="H1419"\w* \w his|strong="H7911"\w* wonderful \w works|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H4714"\w* \w the|strong="H7911"\w* children \w of|strong="H0410"\w* \w men|strong="H1419"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0776"\w* let \w them|strong="H5921"\w* sacrifice \w the|strong="H5921"\w* sacrifice \w of|strong="H0776"\w* praise: \w and|strong="H0776"\w* declare \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w works|strong="H6381"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w joy|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w They|strong="H0559"\w* \w that|strong="H0559"\w* \w go|strong="H7725"\w* \w down|strong="H6440"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* sea \w in|strong="H5975"\w* ships, doing business \w in|strong="H5975"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* great waters:

These \w have|strong="H0776"\w* seen \w the|strong="H1697"\w* works \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H1697"\w* Lord, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w his|strong="H3808"\w* wonders \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H1697"\w* deep.

\w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* word, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w there|strong="H3068"\w* arose \w a|strong="H8085"\w* storm \w of|strong="H3068"\w* wind: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* waves thereof were lifted up.

\w They|strong="H1992"\w* mount \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w to|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* heavens, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w go|strong="H5307"\w* \w down|strong="H5307"\w* \w to|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* depths: \w their|strong="H5375"\w* soul pined \w away|strong="H5375"\w* \w with|strong="H3027"\w* evils.

\w They|strong="H0776"\w* \w were|strong="H0776"\w* troubled, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* reeled \w like|strong="H0776"\w* \w a|strong="H0776"\w* drunken man; \w and|strong="H0776"\w* all \w their|strong="H5307"\w* wisdom \w was|strong="H0776"\w* swallowed up.

\w And|strong="H0398"\w* \w they|strong="H0398"\w* cried \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H0398"\w* Lord \w in|strong="H4191"\w* \w their|strong="H0398"\w* affliction: \w and|strong="H0398"\w* he brought \w them|strong="H0398"\w* out \w of|strong="H2077"\w* \w their|strong="H0398"\w* distresses.

\w And|strong="H6555"\w* he turned \w the|strong="H3707"\w* storm \w into|strong="H6555"\w* \w a|strong="H6555"\w* breeze: \w and|strong="H6555"\w* \w its|strong="H6555"\w* waves \w were|strong="H4046"\w* still.

\w And|strong="H5975"\w* they rejoiced because they \w were|strong="H4046"\w* \w still|strong="H5975"\w*: \w and|strong="H5975"\w* he brought \w them|strong="H5975"\w* \w to|strong="H5975"\w* \w the|strong="H5975"\w* haven which they wished \w for|strong="H6419"\w*.

Let \w the|strong="H5704"\w* mercies \w of|strong="H1755"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* Lord give glory \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w him|strong="H2803"\w*, \w and|strong="H5769"\w* \w his|strong="H2803"\w* wonderful works \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* children \w of|strong="H1755"\w* men.

\w And|strong="H4872"\w* let \w them|strong="H5921"\w* exalt \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* church \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* people: \w and|strong="H4872"\w* praise \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* chair \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* ancients.
\w He|strong="H3588"\w* hath turned rivers into \w a|strong="H3588"\w* wilderness: \w and|strong="H0853"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* sources \w of|strong="H7307"\w* water into dry ground:

\w A|strong="H0834"\w* fruitful land into barrenness, \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* wickedness \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* dwell therein.
He hath turned \w a|strong="H6148"\w* wilderness into pools \w of|strong="H4639"\w* water, \w and|strong="H1471"\w* \w a|strong="H6148"\w* dry land into water springs.

\w And|strong="H0853"\w* hath \w placed|strong="H1961"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* hungry; \w and|strong="H0853"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w made|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* city \w for|strong="H1961"\w* \w their|strong="H1992"\w* habitation.
\w And|strong="H1121"\w* they sowed fields, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* planted vineyards: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* they yielded fruit \w of|strong="H1121"\w* birth.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* blessed \w them|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w were|strong="H0834"\w* multiplied exceedingly: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H0834"\w* cattle \w he|strong="H0834"\w* suffered \w not|strong="H0776"\w* \w to|strong="H0776"\w* decrease.

Then they were brought \w to|strong="H4639"\w* be few: \w and|strong="H4639"\w* they were afflicted through \w the|strong="H2181"\w* trouble \w of|strong="H4639"\w* evils \w and|strong="H4639"\w* sorrow.

Contempt \w was|strong="H3068"\w* poured forth upon \w their|strong="H3068"\w* princes: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* caused \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* wander where \w there|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* no passing, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w out|strong="H0853"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* way.

\w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w he|strong="H5414"\w* \w helped|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* poor \w out|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* poverty: \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w made|strong="H5414"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* families like \w a|strong="H5414"\w* flock \w of|strong="H3027"\w* sheep.

\w The|strong="H8478"\w* just \w shall|strong="H3027"\w* see, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w shall|strong="H3027"\w* rejoice, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* all iniquity \w shall|strong="H3027"\w* stop \w their|strong="H8478"\w* mouth.

Who \w is|strong="H5771"\w* wise, \w and|strong="H6098"\w* \w will|strong="H5771"\w* keep \w these|strong="H1992"\w* \w things|strong="H1992"\w*: \w and|strong="H6098"\w* \w will|strong="H5771"\w* understand \w the|strong="H5337"\w* mercies \w of|strong="H5771"\w* \w the|strong="H5337"\w* Lord?
